mapper.select: SELECT * FROM HELPER_APPLY WHERE HELPER_SEQNO = #{helperSeqno} AND USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT HELPER_SEQNO, HELPER_WANT, HELPER_STATUS, HELPER_PLACE_NAME, HELPER_GENDER, HELPER_MATCH, HELPER_POSITION, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(HELPER_TIME), 'YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일 "DAY" "HH:MM') AS HELPER_TIME FROM HELPER WHERE HELPER_USER_ID in (SELECT HELPER_USER_ID FROM HELPER_APPLY WHERE HELPER_USER_ID = #{userId}) AND HELPER_STATUS = '모집 중'
SELECT COUNT(HELPER_APPLY_STATUS) FROM HELPER_APPLY WHERE HELPER_APPLY_STATUS = '수락'
SELECT USER_ID, USER_GENDER, USER_MAIN_POSITION, USER_SUB_POSITION FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM HELPER_APPLY WHERE HELPER_SEQNO = #{helperSeqno})

SELECT u.USER_NAME, u.USER_ID, u.USER_MAIN_POSITION, NVL(u.USER_SUB_POSITION, '-') as USER_SUB_POSITION, t.TEAM_NAME, NVL(t.TEAM_LEVEL, '-') as TEAM_LEVEL, NVL(TO_CHAR(t.TEAM_RANK), 'UNRANK') as TEAM_RANK FROM USERS u JOIN TEAM_INFO t ON u.USER_ID = t.LEADER_ID OR u.USER_ID = t.MEMBER_ID WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(HELPER_STATUS) FROM HELPER WHERE HELPER_USER_ID = #{userId} AND HELPER_STATUS = '모집 중'
